implementation_output.changes_summary: Implemented macOS LaunchAgent and Linux systemd service support. Created launchd.plist template and launchd_installer.sh for macOS. Created systemd.service template and systemd_installer.sh for Linux. Updated LaunchdInstaller and SystemdInstaller classes in installer.py to delegate to shell scripts using subprocess calls, matching the WindowsServiceInstaller pattern.
